issue.title: [Rust][DataFusion] Improve performance of to_array_of_size
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12119](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12119). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Improves to_array_of_size by utilizing from_trusted_len_iter.

comments.body:
